@ilovelamp wrote:

I was bored, so I decided to add a simple rep system, Really it’s just two commands, one to rep someone and one to check your rep
so I have this so far:

if (command.startsWith("rep")){//rep command by sunshinebear
  string victim = command.substring(4)//tells the command to look for the players name in the 4th space 
        (rep==+1)
	sendMessage("you have repped "+victim);
 
 }catch (exception e){// if they messed up on the command, basically for error
 sendMessage("player "+victim+" not found");

 }

but my problem is on the (rep==+1), it’s repping the person that’s entering the command, I want to know how to have it send the points to the person that is to be repped.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 29, 2008, 08:17:28 pm[/size][hr] no one knows?
